alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Laurel; Powell; Pulaski; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 9:23PM EDT until April 13 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Powell County in east central Kentucky... Central Laurel County in south central Kentucky... Estill County in east central Kentucky... Pulaski County in south central Kentucky... Jackson County in southeastern Kentucky... Rockcastle County in south central Kentucky... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 922 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Nicholasville to near Stanford to near Faubush, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Nancy around 930 PM EDT. Gum Sulphur around 935 PM EDT. Somerset around 940 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Bummer, Harris Ferry and Hargett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Estill; Jackson; Laurel; Powell; Pulaski; Rockcastle
